casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Levarr FRASIER Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided January 18, 2017

Emily Wagner, assistant public defender, in support of the petition.

Matthew A. Weiner, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 169 Conn.App. 500, 150 A.3d 1176 (2016), is denied.
